name: SezonlukdiziCc
categoryNavSelector: nav a[href], .menu a[href], .navbar a[href], .nav a[href], a[href*='/kategori/'], a[href*='/category/'], a[href*='/genre/'], a[href*='/tur/'], a[href*='/kanal/'], a[href*='/liste/'], a[href*='tur%5B%5D=']
detailYearSelector: table tr td:nth-child(3) strong, .table tr td:nth-child(3) strong
detailDurationSelector: table tr td:nth-child(1) strong, .table tr td:nth-child(1) strong
detailCountrySelector: table tr td:nth-child(4) strong, .table tr td:nth-child(4) strong
episodeLinkSelector: #seasonsTabs-tabContent .card-list-item a[href*='/bolum-'], #seasonsTabs-tabContent .card-list-item a[href*='/bolum/'], a[href*='-sezon-'][href*='-bolum-'], a[href*='/bolum-'], a[href*='-bolum-izle'], a[href*='/bolum/'], a.season-episode
